props.description: The voice time manager.

props.name: client

props.name: guild
props.description: The guild class.

props.name: guildId
props.description: The guild id.

props.name: options
props.description: The config options.

props.name: trackBots
props.description: Whether bots are able to be tracked.

props.name: trackMute
props.description: Whether to track all of the guild's voice channels.

props.name: trackDeaf
props.description: Whether members who are deafened should be tracked.

props.name: trackAllChannels
props.description: Whether all of the guild's voice channels should be tracked.

props.name: channelIds
props.description: The channels to track (if trackAllChannels is true this will be ignored).

props.name: minUserCountToParticipate
props.description: The min amount of users to be in a channel to be tracked (0 is equal to no limit).

props.name: maxUserCountToParticipate
props.description: The max amount of users to be in a channel to be tracked uptil (0 is equal to no limit).

props.name: minXpToParticipate
props.description: The min amount of xp the user needs to have to be tracked (0 is equal to no limit).

props.name: minLevelToParticipate
props.description: The min amount of level the user needs to have to be tracked (0 is equal to no limit).

props.name: maxXpToParticipate
props.description: The max amount of xp the user can be tracked uptil (0 is equal to no limit).

props.name: maxLevelToParticipate
props.description: The max amount of level the user can be tracked uptil (0 is equal to no limit).

props.name: voiceTimeTrackingEnabled
props.description: Whether the voice time tracking module is enabled.

props.name: levelingTrackingEnabled
props.description: Whether the leveling tracking module is enabled.

props.name: exemptPermissions
props.description: Members with any of these permissions won't be tracked.

props.name: data
props.description: The raw config data object.

props.name: exemptMembersFunction
props.description: The exemptMembers function

props.name: exemptChannelsFunction
props.description: The exemptChannels function

props.name: xpAmountToAddFunction
props.description: The xpAmountToAdd function

props.name: voiceTimeToAddFunction
props.description: The voiceTimeToAdd function

props.name: levelMultiplierFunction
props.description: The levelMultiplier function

methods.name: exemptMembers
methods.description: Function to filter members. If true is returned, the member won't be tracked.

methods.name: exemptChannels
methods.description: Function to filter channels. If true is returned, the channel won't be tracked.

methods.name: xpAmountToAdd
methods.description: Function for xpAmountToAdd. If not provided, the default value is used (Math.floor(Math.random() * 10) + 1).

methods.name: voiceTimeToAdd
methods.description: Function for voiceTimeToAdd. If not provided, the default value is used (1000).

methods.name: levelMultiplier
methods.description: Function for levelMultiplier. If not provided, the default value is used (0.1).

methods.name: checkMember
methods.description: Function to check if the member is exempt from xp tracking.

methods.name: checkChannel
methods.description: Function to check if the channel is exempt from xp tracking.

methods.name: edit
methods.description: Edits the config

params.name: options

props.name: client
props.description: The Discord Client

props.name: ready
props.description: Whether the manager is ready

props.name: guilds
props.description: The guilds managed by this manager

props.name: options
props.description: The manager options

methods.name: create
methods.description: Creates a new guild in the database
examples:
client.voiceManager.create(interaction.guild.id, {
 users: [], // Array of user data's
 config: {
     trackBots: false, // If the user is a bot it will not be tracked.
     trackAllChannels: true, // All of the channels in the guild will be tracked.
     exemptChannels: () => false, // The user will not be tracked in these channels. (This is a function).
     channelIds: [], // The channel ids to track. (If trackAllChannels is true, this is ignored)
     exemptPermissions: [], // The user permissions to not track.
     exemptMembers: () => false, // The user will not be tracked. (This is a function).
     trackMute: true, // It will track users if they are muted aswell.
     trackDeaf: true, // It will track users if they are deafen aswell.
     minUserCountToParticipate: 0, // The min amount of users to be in a channel to be tracked.
     maxUserCountToParticipate: 0, // The max amount of users to be in a channel to be tracked.
     minXpToParticipate: 0, // The min amount of xp needed to be tracked.
     minLevelToParticipate: 0, // The min level needed to be tracked.
     maxXpToParticipate: 0, // The max amount of xp needed to be tracked.
     maxLevelToParticipate: 0, // The max level needed to be tracked.
     xpAmountToAdd: () => Math.floor(Math.random() * 10) + 1, // The amount of xp to add to the user (This is a function).
     voiceTimeToAdd: () => 1000, // The amount of time in ms to add to the user (This is a function).
     voiceTimeTrackingEnabled: true, // Whether the voiceTimeTracking module is enabled.
     levelingTrackingEnabled: true, // Whether the levelingTracking module is enabled.
     levelMultiplier: () => 0.1, // This will set level multiplier to 0.1 (This is a function).
 }
});

params.name: guildId
params.description: The id of the guild to create

methods.name: edit
methods.description: Edits the given guild's data.

params.description: The id of the guild to edit

methods.description: Deletes the guild from the database

params.description: The id of the guild to delete

methods.description: Gets the guilds from the storage file, or create it

methods.description: Inits the manager

methods.description: Checks each guild and updates it if needed

props.name: default
props.description: The default config options.

props.name: default.trackBots
props.description: Whether bots are able to be tracked.

props.name: default.trackAllChannels
props.description: Whether to track all of the guild's voice channels.

props.name: default.exemptChannels
props.description: Function to filter channels. If true is returned, the channel won't be tracked.

props.name: default.channelIds
props.description: The channels to track (if trackAllChannels is true this will be ignored).

props.name: default.exemptPermissions
props.description: Members with any of these permissions won't be tracked.

props.name: default.exemptMembers
props.description: Function to filter members. If true is returned, the member won't be tracked.

props.name: default.trackMute
props.description: Whether members who are muted should be tracked.

props.name: default.trackDeaf
props.description: Whether members who are deafened should be tracked.

props.name: default.minUserCountToParticipate
props.description: The min amount of users to be in a channel to be tracked (0 is equal to no limit).

props.name: default.maxUserCountToParticipate
props.description: The max amount of users to be in a channel to be tracked uptil (0 is equal to no limit).

props.name: default.minXpToParticipate
props.description: The min amount of xp the user needs to have to be tracked (0 is equal to no limit).

props.name: default.minLevelToParticipate
props.description: The min amount of level the user needs to have to be tracked (0 is equal to no limit).

props.name: default.maxXpToParticipate
props.description: The max amount of xp the user can be tracked uptil (0 is equal to no limit).

props.name: default.maxLevelToParticipate
props.description: The max amount of level the user can be tracked uptil (0 is equal to no limit).

props.name: default.xpAmountToAdd
props.description: Function for xpAmountToAdd. If not provided, the default value is used (Math.floor(Math.random() * 10) + 1).

props.name: default.voiceTimeToAdd
props.description: Function for voiceTimeToAdd. If not provided, the default value is used (1000).

props.name: defaul.voiceTimeTrackingEnabled
props.description: Whether to enable the voice time tracking module.

props.name: default.levelingTrackingEnabled
props.description: Whether to enable the leveling tracking module.

props.name: default.levelMultiplier
props.description: Function for levelMultiplier. If not provided, the default value is used (0.1).

typedefs.name: GuildData
typedefs.description: Raw guild object (used to store guilds in the database).

props.name: guildId
props.description: The guild's id.

props.name: users
props.description: The users stored in the guild.

props.name: config
props.description: The config of the guild.

typedefs.name: UserData
typedefs.description: Raw user object (used to store users in the database).

props.name: guildId
props.description: The user's guild id.

props.name: userId
props.description: The user's id.

props.name: channels
props.description: The channels the user has spent voice time in.

props.name: totalVoiceTime
props.description: The total amount of voice time the user has.

props.name: xp
props.description: The amount of xp the user has.

props.name: level
props.description: The amount of level the user has.

typedefs.name: ChannelData
typedefs.description: Raw channel object (used to store channels in the database).

props.name: guildId
props.description: The channel's guild id.

props.name: channelId
props.description: The channel's id.

props.name: timeInChannel
props.description: The total amount of voice time the user has spent in this channel.

typedefs.name: ConfigData
typedefs.description: Raw config object (used to store config's in the database).

props.name: guildId
props.description: The config's guild id.

props.name: trackBots

props.description: Whether to track all of the guild's voice channels.
